												At most 16 characters are allowed.
											</div>
										</div>
									</md-input-container>
								</span>
							</div>
						</div>
						<div table-column layout="column" flex  dib-column="185247" style="    " >
							<div aria-label="Table_name" can-be-moved=true flex="100" class="md-body-2" layout="row" layout-align="start top" style="    " dib-help=' ' dib-help-url='/nav/dibDocs?id=dibTableForm*4034&text=columns_priv' >
								<div layout=row ng-if="!row.___editing" dib-view flex>
									<span flex data-type="text" >
										<span>
											{{$parent.viewModel['Table_name']}}
										</span>
									</span>
								</div>
								<span dib-edit ng-if="row.___editing" flex>
									<md-input-container aria-label="Table_name" can-be-moved=true flex="100" class="md-block" style="    " dib-help=' ' dib-help-url='/nav/dibDocs?id=dibTableForm*4034&text=columns_priv' >
										<input type="text"  maxlength='64' required         name="Table_name" ng-model="model.Table_name" aria-label="Table Name" ng-enter='searchGrid()' id='ci185247' aria-label="Table_name" dib-container-name='columnsPrivGrid' dib-config="{ listeners : { } }" dib-data-component='input-text' md-detect-hidden >
										<label>
											Table Name*
										</label>
										<div ng-messages="columnsPrivGrid.Table_name.$error">
											<div ng-message="required">
												Table Name required.
											</div>
											<div ng-message="maxlength">
												At most 64 characters are allowed.
											</div>
										</div>
									</md-input-container>
								</span>
							</div>
						</div>
						<div table-column layout="column" flex  dib-column="185248" style="    " >
							<div aria-label="Column_name" can-be-moved=true flex="100" class="md-body-2" layout="row" layout-align="start top" style="    " dib-help=' ' dib-help-url='/nav/dibDocs?id=dibTableForm*4034&text=columns_priv' >
								<div layout=row ng-if="!row.___editing" dib-view flex>
									<span flex data-type="text" >
										<span>
											{{$parent.viewModel['Column_name']}}
										</span>
									</span>
								</div>
								<span dib-edit ng-if="row.___editing" flex>

										<input type="text"  maxlength='64' required         name="Column_name" ng-model="model.Column_name" aria-label="Column Name" ng-enter='searchGrid()' id='ci185248' aria-label="Column_name" dib-container-name='columnsPrivGrid' dib-config="{ listeners : { } }" dib-data-component='input-text' md-detect-hidden >

										</label>

												At most 64 characters are allowed.

									<span flex data-type="dateTime" >

										</span>
									</span>
								</div>
								<span dib-edit ng-if="row.___editing" flex>
									<md-input-container aria-label="Timestamp" can-be-moved=true flex="100" class="md-block" style="    " dib-help=' ' dib-help-url='/nav/dibDocs?id=dibTableForm*4034&text=columns_priv' >
										<input type="text" theme="material" ng-model="model.Timestamp"         name="Timestamp" required aria-label="Timestamp" placeholder="Timestamp" dib-data-component='time-date-picker-input' time-date-picker-input display-mode="material" display-format="d MMMM yyyy  HH:mm" mindate="1800-01-01" maxdate="2999-12-31" aria-invalid="true" id='ci185249' aria-label="Timestamp" dib-container-name='columnsPrivGrid' dib-config="{ listeners : { } }" >
									</md-input-container>
								</span>
							</div>
						</div>
						<div table-column layout="column" flex  dib-column="185250" style="    " >
							<div aria-label="Column_priv" can-be-moved=true flex="100" class="md-body-2" layout="row" layout-align="start top" style="    " dib-help=' ' dib-help-url='/nav/dibDocs?id=dibTableForm*4034&text=columns_priv' >

									<span flex data-type="text" >
										<span>
											{{$parent.viewModel['Column_priv']}}
										</span>
									</span>
								</div>
								<span dib-edit ng-if="row.___editing" flex>
									<div layout='row' aria-label="Column_priv" can-be-moved=true flex="100" style="    " dib-help=' ' dib-help-url='/nav/dibDocs?id=dibTableForm*4034&text=columns_priv' >
										<md-input-container flex>
											<label>
												Column Priv
											</label>
											<md-select    ng-required=true         ng-disabled="model._GET['Column_priv'][recordStatus]" dib-data-component='enum' dib-onload-service placeholder="Column Priv" aria-label="Column_priv" md-on-close="select185250(model)" flex ng-model="model.Column_priv" name='Column_priv' id='ci185250' aria-label="Column_priv" dib-container-name='columnsPrivGrid' dib-config="{ listeners : { } }" >
												<md-option ng-repeat="state in ['Select','Insert','Update','References']" value="{{state}}"  >
													{{state}} 
												</md-option>
											</md-select>
											<div ng-messages="columnsPrivGrid.Column_priv.$error">
												<div ng-message="required">
													Column Priv required.
												</div>
											</div>
										</md-input-container>
									</div>
								</span>
							</div>
						</div>
						<div class='dib-inline-edit-buttons' flex='none' dib-edit >
							<md-button ng-click='toggleInlineAdd()' class="md-raised ">
								Close 
							</md-button>
							<md-button ng-click='cleanRow($event,model, columnsPrivGrid)' class="md-raised "  ng-disabled='!columnsPrivGrid.$dirty'>
								Clear   
							</md-button>
							<md-button ng-click='useSelectedRow($event,model)' class="md-raised md-primary"  ng-disabled="!lastSelectedItem">
								Use selected data 
							</md-button>
							<md-button ng-click='addRow($event,row)' class="md-raised  md-accent  "  ng-disabled="!columnsPrivGrid.$valid">
								Add   
							</md-button>
						</div>
					</ng-form>
				</md-list-item>
			</md-list>
		</div>
		<md-content  fill-height footer-element='.dib-grid-footer' class='dib-grid-column-content'>
			<md-list dib-table-column-width >
				<md-list-item ng-if="gridData.length == 0"  layout-align="center center">
					<div class="no-records-available">
						  No records available 
					</div>
				</md-list-item>
				<md-list-item class="md-1-line _md-no-proxy " ng-repeat="row in gridData"  ng-class="{ 'md-custom-accent' : row.___selected, 'first-record-padding' : $index==0 && row.___editing }" ng-click="selectRow(row, $event)"   double-click="rowEdit(element)" >
					<ng-form name='columnsPrivGrid' dib-container-name="columnsPrivGrid" isolate-form layout="row" flex="100" dib-inline-edit="closed" layout-align="start start" ng-enter='saveRow($event,row)' >
						<div table-column layout="column" flex = 'nogrow' dib-column="184616" style="    " >
							<md-button aria-label="btngridedit" can-be-moved=true flex="nogrow" class="md-icon-button  md-squared md-raised" style="    " id='ci184616' aria-label="btngridedit" dib-container-name='columnsPrivGrid' ng-click="common.goTo('columnsPrivForm','',true,'?primary_Host='+row.Host+'&primary_Db='+row.Db+'&primary_User='+row.User+'&primary_Table_name='+row.Table_name+'&primary_Column_name='+row.Column_name,'',$event);" dib-config="{ listeners : { } }" >
								<md-tooltip md-direction="top" md-delay="500">
									View/edit record in a form
								</md-tooltip>
								<md-icon class="md-opacity-55" md-svg-icon="/files/dropins/setNgMaterial/dibAdmin/images/ic_mode_edit_black.svg">
								</md-icon>
							</md-button>
						</div>
						<div table-column layout="column" flex  dib-column="185244" style="    " >
							<div aria-label="Host" can-be-moved=true flex="100" class="md-body-2" layout="row" layout-align="start top" style="    " dib-help=' ' dib-help-url='/nav/dibDocs?id=dibTableForm*4034&text=columns_priv' >
								<div layout=row ng-if="!row.___editing" dib-view flex>
									<span flex data-type="text" >
										<span>
											{{$parent.viewModel['Host']}}
										</span>
									</span>
								</div>
								<span dib-edit ng-if="row.___editing" flex>
									<md-input-container aria-label="Host" can-be-moved=true flex="100" class="md-block" style="    " dib-help=' ' dib-help-url='/nav/dibDocs?id=dibTableForm*4034&text=columns_priv' >
										<input type="text"  maxlength='60' required         name="Host" ng-model="model.Host" aria-label="Host" ng-enter='searchGrid()' id='ci185244' aria-label="Host" dib-container-name='columnsPrivGrid' dib-config="{ listeners : { } }" dib-data-component='input-text' md-detect-hidden >
										<label>
											Host*
										</label>

									<span flex data-type="text" >

										</span>
									</span>
								</div>
								<span dib-edit ng-if="row.___editing" flex>
									<md-input-container aria-label="Db" can-be-moved=true flex="100" class="md-block" style="    " dib-help=' ' dib-help-url='/nav/dibDocs?id=dibTableForm*4034&text=columns_priv' >
										<input type="text"  maxlength='64' required         name="Db" ng-model="model.Db" aria-label="Db" ng-enter='searchGrid()' id='ci185245' aria-label="Db" dib-container-name='columnsPrivGrid' dib-config="{ listeners : { } }" dib-data-component='input-text' md-detect-hidden >

							</div>

							<div aria-label="User" can-be-moved=true flex="100" class="md-body-2" layout="row" layout-align="start top" style="    " dib-help=' ' dib-help-url='/nav/dibDocs?id=dibTableForm*4034&text=columns_priv' >
								<div layout=row ng-if="!row.___editing" dib-view flex>
									<span flex data-type="text" >

											{{$parent.viewModel['User']}}
										</span>
									</span>
								</div>
								<span dib-edit ng-if="row.___editing" flex>
									<md-input-container aria-label="User" can-be-moved=true flex="100" class="md-block" style="    " dib-help=' ' dib-help-url='/nav/dibDocs?id=dibTableForm*4034&text=columns_priv' >
										<input type="text"  maxlength='16' required         name="User" ng-model="model.User" aria-label="User" ng-enter='searchGrid()' id='ci185246' aria-label="User" dib-container-name='columnsPrivGrid' dib-config="{ listeners : { } }" dib-data-component='input-text' md-detect-hidden >

									<span flex data-type="text" >

										</span>
									</span>
								</div>
								<span dib-edit ng-if="row.___editing" flex>
									<md-input-container aria-label="Table_name" can-be-moved=true flex="100" class="md-block" style="    " dib-help=' ' dib-help-url='/nav/dibDocs?id=dibTableForm*4034&text=columns_priv' >

									</span>

										<input type="text" theme="material" ng-model="model.Timestamp"         name="Timestamp" required aria-label="Timestamp" placeholder="Timestamp" dib-data-component='time-date-picker-input' time-date-picker-input display-mode="material" display-format="d MMMM yyyy  HH:mm" mindate="1800-01-01" maxdate="2999-12-31" aria-invalid="true" id='ci185249' aria-label="Timestamp" dib-container-name='columnsPrivGrid' dib-config="{ listeners : { } }" >
									</md-input-container>
								</span>
							</div>
						</div>

								<div layout=row ng-if="!row.___editing" dib-view flex>
									<span flex data-type="text" >
										<span>
											{{$parent.viewModel['Column_priv']}}
										</span>
									</span>
								</div>
								<span dib-edit ng-if="row.___editing" flex>
									<div layout='row' aria-label="Column_priv" can-be-moved=true flex="100" style="    " dib-help=' ' dib-help-url='/nav/dibDocs?id=dibTableForm*4034&text=columns_priv' >
										<md-input-container flex>
											<label>
												Column Priv
											</label>
											<md-select    ng-required=true         ng-disabled="model._GET['Column_priv'][recordStatus]" dib-data-component='enum' dib-onload-service placeholder="Column Priv" aria-label="Column_priv" md-on-close="select185250(model)" flex ng-model="model.Column_priv" name='Column_priv' id='ci185250' aria-label="Column_priv" dib-container-name='columnsPrivGrid' dib-config="{ listeners : { } }" >
												<md-option ng-repeat="state in ['Select','Insert','Update','References']" value="{{state}}"  >
													{{state}} 
												</md-option>
											</md-select>
											<div ng-messages="columnsPrivGrid.Column_priv.$error">
												<div ng-message="required">
													Column Priv required.
												</div>
											</div>
										</md-input-container>
									</div>
								</span>
							</div>
						</div>
						<div class='dib-inline-edit-buttons' flex="none" ng-if="row.___editing">
							<md-button ng-click='cancelRow($event,row)' class="md-raised ">
								Cancel 
							</md-button>
							<md-button ng-click='saveRow($event,row)' class="md-raised  md-accent " ng-disabled="!columnsPrivGrid.$valid" >
								Save   
							</md-button>
						</div>
					</ng-form>
				</md-list-item>
			</md-list>
		</md-content>
		<div layout-fill layout='row' flex class='dib-grid-footer'>
			<div flex=20 layout='row'>
				<md-button disabled>
					Page limit
				</md-button>
				<md-select ng-model="page.limit">
					<md-option ng-value="10">
						10
					</md-option>
					<md-option ng-value="20">
						20
					</md-option>
					<md-option ng-value="50">
						50
					</md-option>
				</md-select>
			</div>
			<div  ng-if="page.count>
				1" flex=80 layout='row'  layout-align="center center" >
				<md-button ng-disabled="page.number==1" ng-click='firstPage()'>
					First 
				</md-button>
				<md-button ng-disabled="page.number==1" ng-click='previousPage()'>
					Prev 
				</md-button>
				<div layout='row'>
					<md-button disabled>
						Page
					</md-button>
					<md-input-container>
						<input type='number' ng-model="page.number" aria-label="Page number">
					</md-input-container>
					<md-button disabled>
						of {{ page.count }} 
					</md-button>
				</div>
				<md-button ng-disabled="page.count==page.number" ng-click='nextPage()'>
					Next 
				</md-button>
				<md-button  ng-disabled="page.count==page.number" ng-click='lastPage()'>
					Last 
				</md-button>
			</div>
		</div>
	</div>
